comments:
Using I20070410-1043, I got this exception when trying to open a compare editor by double-clicking on an outgoing change.
Looks like a timing issue since I could not reproduce it.

java.lang.NullPointerException at org.eclipse.compare.CompareEditorInput.runAsynchronously(CompareEditorInput.java:1100)at org.eclipse.compare.structuremergeviewer.StructureDiffViewer.compareInputChanged(StructureDiffViewer.java:348)at org.eclipse.compare.structuremergeviewer.StructureDiffViewer$2.run(StructureDiffViewer.java:72)at org.eclipse.compare.internal.Worker.performNextTask(Worker.java:116)at org.eclipse.compare.internal.Worker.run(Worker.java:63)at org.eclipse.compare.internal.WorkerJob.run(WorkerJob.java:30)at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
*** Bug 183343 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
